Comment: This is going to backfire badly for this judge.    * First, I'd expect the DOJ to decline to prosecute. * Next, it isn't going to have any impact on Trump. * In ignoring SCOTUS' opportunities to walk things back a bit, he's harming the dignity and credibility of the judiciary. * It may well prove the pivot issue that gives *larger* margins to Republicans in Congress.   * If the above happens, you can be certain there will be legislation that will regulate the authority of district judges.  The administration picked this as the line in the sand for a reason.
